### emitCFILabel() {#a94cdaca7695af6f6b02f54297384088d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MCSymbol &#42; MipsELFStreamer::emitCFILabel ()</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
When emitting an object file, create and emit a real label.

When emitting textual assembly, this should do nothing to avoid polluting our output.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipselfstreamer-h/#l00065">65</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipselfstreamer-h">MipsELFStreamer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipselfstreamer-cpp/#l00061">61</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipselfstreamer-cpp">MipsELFStreamer.cpp</a>.

### emitInstruction() {#a4edf55e6bd046a52bbb7867d8a601e3c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MipsELFStreamer::emitInstruction (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp; Inst, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; STI)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Overriding this function allows us to add arbitrary behaviour before the <code>Inst</code> is actually emitted.

For example, we can inspect the operands and gather sufficient information that allows us to reason about the register usage for the translation unit.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipselfstreamer-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipselfstreamer-h">MipsELFStreamer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipselfstreamer-cpp/#l00036">36</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipselfstreamer-cpp">MipsELFStreamer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### emitIntValue() {#ad5453aa898813b8ffa313658fa144eb7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MipsELFStreamer::emitIntValue (uint64&#95;t Value, unsigned Size)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Special case of EmitValue that avoids the client having to pass in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> for constant integers.

EmitIntValue - Special case of EmitValue that avoids the client having to pass in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> for constant integers.

### emitLabel() {#a793c490905306831407494fcb8d2c2b5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MipsELFStreamer::emitLabel (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42; Symbol, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> Loc=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a>())</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Overriding this function allows us to record all labels that should be marked as microMIPS.

Based on this data marking is done in EmitInstruction.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipselfstreamer-h/#l00049">49</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipselfstreamer-h">MipsELFStreamer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipselfstreamer-cpp/#l00088">88</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipselfstreamer-cpp">MipsELFStreamer.cpp</a>.
